casebody.data:
Ronald D. HENDRIX, BDOE of Chesterfield, Inc., BDOE, Inc., and BD75, Inc., Appellants/Cross-appellees,
v.
JIM SHERIDAN, UES, LLC, SFCC-Olathe, Inc., and Sheridan's Franchise Systems, Inc., Appellees/Cross-appellants. No. 117,112 Court of Appeals of Kansas. Opinion filed May 18, 2018.

Affirmed in part. Modified in part.
